name: Bone Colossus
description: The Bone Colossus is a gargantuan undead creature with an imposing presence, consisting of large bone fragments and animated with chaotic evil energy.
memorable: Its ability to split into four smaller swarms and communicate telepathically via a hive mind creates a convoluted and dangerous battlefield.
goals: To dominate the battlefield and create chaos through its swarm abilities and overwhelming force.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other undead or creatures that serve chaotic forces.
environment: Often found in areas of conflict or destruction, where it can serve as a siege engine.
strengths: High hit points and damage resistance, including immunity to necrotic and poison damage, making it resilient.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity results in a moderate ability to evade attacks, and its Intelligence can drop significantly when injured.
attacks: Employs a devastating Thunderous Slam attack dealing bludgeoning and thunder damage, and its swarm form utilizes razor teeth.
most_powerful_ability: Swarm Form allows it to split into four smaller swarms that can attack independently, significantly complicating combat for opponents.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 18, indicating keen awareness.
skills: Has proficiency in intimidation and perception, allowing it to instill fear and detect threats effectively.
additional_information: Immunities to several disabling effects including charmed and frightened.
Can deal double damage to objects and structures.
Gains advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.
test_queries: massive undead creature with swarm abilities
